div.p: Allowed value set for healthcare facility type code represents the type of organizational setting of the clinical encounter during which the documented act occurred.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Import all the codes that are contained in http://ehealth.sundhed.dk/vs/sor-organization-type

description.value: Allowed value set for healthcare facility type code represents the type of organizational setting of the clinical encounter during which the documented act occurred.
